title: Our LAST Studio! Don't Wait To Apply to Your Dream Home Today!!
posting_body: ['THE MERCER APARTMENT HOMES', 'The Island Lifestyle.', 'The Mercer Apartment Homes is the jewel of Mercer Island.', 'From the sparkling waters of our heated year round pool, to the soaring ceilings that go up to 20ft high, and everything in between, The Mercer is the whole package.', "Whether you prefer the contemporary, urban designs of the Mercer West building, or the warm classic design of the East Building, we've got it.", 'Get your heart rate up in our fitness center, and relax in the dry sauna after.', 'Get to know your neighbors at our monthly community events, or go out on the town to Seattle or Bellevue, both just right across the bridge!', 'Come down to The Mercer and see for yourself!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 32', 'OR Text', '32', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text us.', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 470 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', "- 9' to 20' Ceilings with Crown Molding", '- Berber Carpets', '- Pre-Wired for High Speed Internet up to 1000 Mbps', '- Central A/C & Heating in Every Residence', '- Plank Wood Style Flooring in select homes', '- All-Concrete Building for Enhanced Sound Insulation', '- Granite and White Quartz countertops', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Cherry wood, Black and Tan cabinetry', '- Built–In Microwaves', '- Balconies on select units', '- Walk-In Closets', 'Community Amenities', '- Three Large Courtyards', "- Three Outdoor BBQ's", '- Designated Dog Run - Pets are welcome!', '- Business Center', '- Smoke-Free Community', '- Outdoor Heated Swimming Pool & Jacuzzi', '- Dry-Heat Sauna', '- Clubhouse / Lounge with Full Kitchen', '- Wi-Fi Hotspots', '- State of the Art Fitness Center', '- Guest Suite Available for Residents', '- Controlled entry access', '- On-Site Storage / Bike Storage', 'Pet Policy', 'The Mercer welcomes your pets.', 'Our homes accommodate two pets per home.', 'Additional deposits and breed restrictions apply.', 'For more information please call today.', 'Pet Rent: $35-$45 per pet', 'Driving Directions', 'Take the Island Crest Way exit off of I-90, and find our building next to Chevron, kitty corner to the Walgreens.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday: 11:00AM-5:00PM', 'The Mercer', '7650 SE 27th', 'St, Mercer Island, WA, 98040', 'DeK34iPiF']
